long_description: The artfully-woven, slip-on Born Beah Sandals are crafted from supple full-grain leathers for excellent comfort and a stylish look that's perfect for summertime strolls. Open backs allow easy on and off. Lightweight polyurethane outsoles provide good traction. Inside stretch goring allows the sandals to accept feet with high insteps. Born Beah Sandals have a heel height of 1.5 in. Closeout.
short_description: The artfully-woven, slip-on Born Beah Sandals are crafted from supple full-grain leathers for excellent comfort and a stylish look that's perfect for summertime strolls.
